summary:
**Meeting Overview**: The City of Dallas Public Facility Corporation Board of Directors will hold a meeting on February 27, 2024, at 12:00 PM at Dallas City Hall and via videoconference. The meeting aims to discuss and make decisions on various administrative and operational matters concerning the Corporation.

**Key Agenda Items**: The meeting will cover several significant topics, including the approval of previous meeting minutes, the election of a new Board Secretary, and the appointment of Albert Gonzalez as the Corporation’s General Manager. Additionally, the board will discuss insurance coverage for directors and officers, the annual report, and contracts for website design and audit services.

**Important Details**: Key proposals include the establishment of a home improvement and preservation program, setting household area median income targets, and reviewing the Corporation’s financial contributions and bylaws. Updates on staff hiring and financial reports will also be presented.

**Action Items**: The Board is seeking approval for the appointment of the General Manager, insurance coverage, the annual report, and contracts with Cimone Key Creative Studio and Logan and Associates. The meeting will also involve discussions that may lead to decisions on the proposed home improvement program and financial targets. Public testimony will be allowed on agenda items, and individuals wishing to speak must register in advance.
